brain-young-adult-1.title: Too Many Commitments
brain-young-adult-1.description: A college student faces exams, a part-time job, and family pressure-prioritize to protect focus.

brain-young-adult-2.title: Saying Yes Again
brain-young-adult-2.description: A young adult learns to say no without guilt so the mental load stays manageable.

brain-young-adult-3.title: Pressure Signals
brain-young-adult-3.description: A student recognizes physical and emotional stress signs during a busy academic period.

brain-young-adult-4.title: Deadline Collision
brain-young-adult-4.description: Two important deadlines suddenly fall on the same day - learn to adapt and prioritize.

brain-young-adult-5.title: Comparison Pressure
brain-young-adult-5.description: A young adult sees peers appearing successful and calm online, learning to handle comparison pressure.

brain-young-adult-6.title: No Break Day
brain-young-adult-6.description: A young adult works continuously without taking breaks to stay productive, learning to manage energy effectively.

brain-young-adult-7.title: Family Expectations
brain-young-adult-7.description: Family expectations increase pressure during exams or job search, learning to communicate emotional boundaries.

brain-young-adult-8.title: Last-Minute Panic
brain-young-adult-8.description: Tasks pile up due to repeated delays, learning to break them down into smaller steps.

brain-young-adult-9.title: Control vs Concern
brain-young-adult-9.description: A young adult worries about many things beyond control, learning to focus on what can be managed.

brain-young-adult-10.title: Reset Point
brain-young-adult-10.description: Stress peaks after weeks of pressure, learning when and how to reset effectively.

brain-young-adult-11.title: The Unknown Result
brain-young-adult-11.description: A student has completed an important exam but results are pending, learning to handle uncertainty effectively.

brain-young-adult-12.title: Fear Before the Interview
brain-young-adult-12.description: A young adult prepares for an important interview, learning to manage fear and find balance in preparation.

brain-young-adult-13.title: What If Thoughts
brain-young-adult-13.description: A student repeatedly thinks about negative future possibilities, learning to manage anxious thoughts effectively.

brain-young-adult-14.title: Fear of Disappointing Others
brain-young-adult-14.description: Family or mentors expect strong performance, learning to manage the fear of letting others down.

brain-young-adult-15.title: Fear of Starting
brain-young-adult-15.description: A task feels overwhelming before starting, learning to overcome the fear of failure that prevents action.

brain-young-adult-16.title: Fear of Being Judged
brain-young-adult-16.description: A young adult worries about others' opinions, learning to manage the fear of negative judgement.

brain-young-adult-17.title: Unclear Future Path
brain-young-adult-17.description: A student feels unsure about career direction, learning to manage the fear of choosing the wrong path.

brain-young-adult-18.title: After a Mistake
brain-young-adult-18.description: A mistake occurs in an important task, learning to manage the fear of consequences and choose a healthy response.

brain-young-adult-19.title: Fear of Falling Behind
brain-young-adult-19.description: Peers seem to progress faster, learning to manage the fear of lagging behind and choose a healthy response.

brain-young-adult-20.title: Facing the Outcome
brain-young-adult-20.description: An outcome does not match expectations, learning to manage disappointment and fear of future failure.

brain-young-adult-21.title: Sudden Irritation
brain-young-adult-21.description: A young adult feels irritated during a normal conversation without knowing why, learning to manage sudden emotional reactions.

brain-young-adult-22.title: Mixed Emotions
brain-young-adult-22.description: A young adult feels happy and anxious at the same time about an opportunity, learning to manage conflicting emotions.

brain-young-adult-23.title: Emotional Build-Up
brain-young-adult-23.description: Emotions build up after several stressful days, learning to manage emotional accumulation.

brain-young-adult-24.title: Feeling Numb
brain-young-adult-24.description: A young adult feels emotionally disconnected after prolonged stress, learning to manage emotional disconnection.

brain-young-adult-25.title: Anger Trigger
brain-young-adult-25.description: A small event triggers unexpected anger, learning to manage anger responses effectively.

brain-young-adult-26.title: Mood Swings
brain-young-adult-26.description: Mood shifts occur throughout the day, learning to manage unpredictable emotional changes.

brain-young-adult-27.title: Emotional Spillover
brain-young-adult-27.description: Stress from one area affects another, learning to manage emotional spillover effects.

brain-young-adult-28.title: Emotional Triggers
brain-young-adult-28.description: Certain situations repeatedly trigger emotions, learning to recognize and manage emotional triggers.

brain-young-adult-29.title: Emotional Expression
brain-young-adult-29.description: A young adult struggles to express feelings clearly, learning to communicate emotions effectively.

brain-young-adult-30.title: Emotional Reset
brain-young-adult-30.description: Emotions feel overwhelming after a long day, learning to reset and manage emotional fatigue.

brain-young-adult-31.title: Feeling Not Good Enough
brain-young-adult-31.description: A young adult compares personal progress with peers and feels inadequate, learning to manage self-worth challenges.

brain-young-adult-32.title: Social Media Identity
brain-young-adult-32.description: A young adult curates an online image different from real life, learning to manage social media identity pressures.

brain-young-adult-33.title: Seeking Approval
brain-young-adult-33.description: Decisions are influenced by others' opinions, learning to balance external approval with personal values.

brain-young-adult-34.title: Labeling Yourself
brain-young-adult-34.description: A young adult labels themselves based on one failure, learning to separate actions from identity.

brain-young-adult-35.title: Comparing Life Timelines
brain-young-adult-35.description: Peers reach milestones at different times, learning to accept personal life timelines.

brain-young-adult-36.title: Confidence Drop
brain-young-adult-36.description: A setback reduces confidence suddenly, learning to recover from unexpected failures.

brain-young-adult-37.title: Identity Confusion
brain-young-adult-37.description: A young adult feels unsure about who they are becoming, learning to navigate identity formation.

brain-young-adult-38.title: External Validation Loop
brain-young-adult-38.description: Self-worth depends on likes, praise, or recognition, learning to build internal validation.

brain-young-adult-39.title: Comparing Success
brain-young-adult-39.description: Success is measured against peers' achievements, learning to define personal success criteria.

brain-young-adult-40.title: Self-Image Reset
brain-young-adult-40.description: Negative self-image builds over time, learning to challenge self-critical thoughts.

brain-young-adult-41.title: Pressure to Fit In
brain-young-adult-41.description: A young adult feels pressure to behave like peers to feel accepted, learning to balance social belonging with authenticity.

brain-young-adult-42.title: Difficulty Saying No
brain-young-adult-42.description: Friends frequently request time and favors, learning to set healthy boundaries.

brain-young-adult-43.title: Relationship Conflict
brain-young-adult-43.description: A disagreement arises with a close friend, learning to navigate relationship conflicts constructively.

brain-young-adult-44.title: People-Pleasing Pattern
brain-young-adult-44.description: A young adult often prioritises others' needs over their own, learning to balance personal boundaries.

brain-young-adult-45.title: Social Energy Drain
brain-young-adult-45.description: Social interactions feel exhausting, learning to manage social energy sustainably.

brain-young-adult-46.title: Unclear Boundaries
brain-young-adult-46.description: Boundaries with friends or colleagues are unclear, learning to establish clear personal boundaries.

brain-young-adult-47.title: Peer Influence
brain-young-adult-47.description: Peers influence decisions that feel uncomfortable, learning to make value-based choices.

brain-young-adult-48.title: Emotional Dependence
brain-young-adult-48.description: Mood depends heavily on others' reactions, learning to build emotional independence.

brain-young-adult-49.title: Relationship Expectations
brain-young-adult-49.description: Expectations in a relationship feel heavy, learning to manage relationship expectations healthily.

brain-young-adult-50.title: Choosing Distance
brain-young-adult-50.description: A relationship feels emotionally draining, learning to create healthy boundaries.

brain-young-adult-51.title: Endless Scrolling
brain-young-adult-51.description: A young adult scrolls social media late into the night, learning to manage digital habits effectively.

brain-young-adult-52.title: Notification Overload
brain-young-adult-52.description: Constant notifications interrupt focus, learning to manage digital interruptions effectively.

brain-young-adult-53.title: Online Comparison Loop
brain-young-adult-53.description: A young adult compares life with online content, learning to manage comparison feelings effectively.

brain-young-adult-54.title: Digital Multitasking
brain-young-adult-54.description: Multiple apps are used simultaneously, learning to manage digital focus effectively.

brain-young-adult-55.title: Late-Night Screen Use
brain-young-adult-55.description: Screen usage continues late at night, learning to manage evening digital habits effectively.

brain-young-adult-56.title: Mental Noise
brain-young-adult-56.description: Constant digital input creates mental clutter, learning to manage mental clarity effectively.

brain-young-adult-57.title: Fear of Missing Out
brain-young-adult-57.description: Seeing others' activities online creates anxiety, learning to manage FOMO effectively.

brain-young-adult-58.title: Online Arguments
brain-young-adult-58.description: An online discussion becomes heated, learning to manage digital interactions effectively.

brain-young-adult-59.title: Constant Availability
brain-young-adult-59.description: Being reachable at all times feels exhausting, learning to manage availability effectively.

brain-young-adult-60.title: Digital Reset
brain-young-adult-60.description: Digital overload builds over time, learning to manage digital balance effectively.

brain-young-adult-61.title: Lost Motivation
brain-young-adult-61.description: A young adult feels unmotivated despite having important goals, learning to manage motivation effectively.

brain-young-adult-62.title: Discipline vs Mood
brain-young-adult-62.description: Mood fluctuates daily, affecting productivity, learning to manage discipline versus mood effectively.

brain-young-adult-63.title: Early Burnout Signs
brain-young-adult-63.description: Fatigue appears even after rest, learning to recognize and respond to early burnout signs.

brain-young-adult-64.title: Procrastination Loop
brain-young-adult-64.description: Tasks are repeatedly postponed, learning to break the procrastination cycle effectively.

brain-young-adult-65.title: Overworking Pattern
brain-young-adult-65.description: A young adult works excessively without rest, learning to manage work-rest balance effectively.

brain-young-adult-66.title: Loss of Interest
brain-young-adult-66.description: Interest in activities suddenly drops, learning to manage interest and engagement effectively.

brain-young-adult-67.title: Discipline Fatigue
brain-young-adult-67.description: Maintaining routines feels exhausting, learning to manage discipline sustainability effectively.

brain-young-adult-68.title: Productivity Guilt
brain-young-adult-68.description: Feeling guilty for not being productive, learning to manage self-compassion effectively.

brain-young-adult-69.title: Energy Mismatch
brain-young-adult-69.description: Energy levels vary throughout the day, learning to align tasks with energy patterns effectively.

brain-young-adult-70.title: Burnout Reset
brain-young-adult-70.description: Burnout signs become noticeable, learning to manage burnout recovery effectively.

brain-young-adult-71.title: Money Worry
brain-young-adult-71.description: A young adult worries constantly about expenses and limited income, learning to manage financial stress effectively.

brain-young-adult-72.title: Emotional Spending
brain-young-adult-72.description: A young adult shops to feel better emotionally, learning to manage emotional spending effectively.

brain-young-adult-73.title: Comparing Finances
brain-young-adult-73.description: Peers appear financially better off, learning to manage financial comparison stress effectively.

brain-young-adult-74.title: Fear of Running Out
brain-young-adult-74.description: Savings feel insufficient, learning to manage financial security concerns effectively.

brain-young-adult-75.title: Income Uncertainty
brain-young-adult-75.description: Income is irregular or uncertain, learning to manage unpredictable cash flow effectively.

brain-young-adult-76.title: Spending Pressure
brain-young-adult-76.description: Social situations encourage spending beyond comfort, learning to manage FOMO-related spending pressure.

brain-young-adult-77.title: Debt Anxiety
brain-young-adult-77.description: Debt feels overwhelming, learning to manage repayment fears and financial stress effectively.

brain-young-adult-78.title: Saving vs Living
brain-young-adult-78.description: Balancing saving money and enjoying life feels difficult, learning to find harmony between financial security and present enjoyment.

brain-young-adult-79.title: Financial Mistake
brain-young-adult-79.description: A poor financial decision causes regret, learning to handle self-blame and transform mistakes into growth opportunities.

brain-young-adult-80.title: Financial Reset
brain-young-adult-80.description: Money stress accumulates over time, learning to recognize overload signals and reset financial perspective effectively.

brain-young-adult-81.title: Decision Under Stress
brain-young-adult-81.description: A young adult must make an important decision while feeling emotionally stressed, learning to manage emotional interference in decision-making.

brain-young-adult-82.title: Emotional Reaction Choice
brain-young-adult-82.description: An emotional reaction arises during a disagreement, learning to manage responses when feeling misunderstood.

brain-young-adult-83.title: Impulsive Choice
brain-young-adult-83.description: Strong emotions push toward quick action, learning to manage urgency and develop better impulse control.

brain-young-adult-84.title: Emotional Bias
brain-young-adult-84.description: Past experiences influence current decisions, learning to recognize emotional biases and make balanced choices.

brain-young-adult-85.title: Pressure-Driven Choice
brain-young-adult-85.description: External pressure pushes for quick decisions, learning to recognize influence and maintain personal boundaries.

brain-young-adult-86.title: Overthinking Loop
brain-young-adult-86.description: A decision is delayed due to overthinking, learning to break the cycle and make timely choices.

brain-young-adult-87.title: Emotion vs Logic
brain-young-adult-87.description: Emotion conflicts with logical thinking, learning to balance feelings and rational analysis for better decisions.

brain-young-adult-88.title: Avoidance Decision
brain-young-adult-88.description: Avoiding decisions feels easier, learning to face responsibility and build decision-making confidence.

brain-young-adult-89.title: Emotional Regret
brain-young-adult-89.description: A decision leads to regret, learning to handle self-blame constructively and transform mistakes into growth opportunities.

brain-young-adult-90.title: Decision Reset
brain-young-adult-90.description: Multiple decisions create fatigue, learning to recognize mental exhaustion and reset decision-making capacity.

brain-young-adult-91.title: Handling Setbacks
brain-young-adult-91.description: A planned outcome fails unexpectedly, learning to build resilience and adapt effectively to disappointment.

brain-young-adult-92.title: Emotional Recovery
brain-young-adult-92.description: Emotional exhaustion follows stress, learning to recognize low energy signals and recover effectively.

brain-young-adult-93.title: Learning from Failure
brain-young-adult-93.description: Failure occurs despite effort, learning to transform self-doubt into growth opportunities and develop resilience.

brain-young-adult-94.title: Coping with Change
brain-young-adult-94.description: Unexpected changes disrupt plans, learning to manage loss of control and develop healthy coping strategies.

brain-young-adult-95.title: Emotional Strength
brain-young-adult-95.description: Repeated challenges test endurance, learning to build mental resilience and emotional coping strategies.

brain-young-adult-96.title: Recovery After Loss
brain-young-adult-96.description: Loss of an opportunity affects confidence, learning to process disappointment and rebuild resilience.

brain-young-adult-97.title: Emotional Endurance
brain-young-adult-97.description: Long-term pressure tests patience, learning to maintain balance and build sustainable emotional stamina.

brain-young-adult-98.title: Inner Stability
brain-young-adult-98.description: External situations feel unstable, learning to cultivate internal calm and reduce dependence on external validation.

brain-young-adult-99.title: Long-Term Perspective
brain-young-adult-99.description: Short-term setbacks feel overwhelming, learning to shift perspective and reduce stress through long-term thinking.

brain-young-adult-100.title: Resilience Reset
brain-young-adult-100.description: After many challenges, energy feels low, learning to recognise accumulated fatigue and rebuild resilience effectively.
